text: Question 25 H +1 MARK Your Time Taken: 59s Avg Time Taken By Others: Im13s ~ Attempt Accuracy: 40% Basics Of Turing Machine Consider the following statement: S-1:The set of Turing machines that accept at least one string is recognizable (r.e.). S-2:The set of Turing machines that accept at least one string is undecidable only S-1is true only S-2 is true Both are true none
